entries.title: Charity tries to provide dignity as well as food as cost of living soars
entries.description: On top of necessities of life, Humans MCR points people towards advice on all manner of financial struggles

entries.title: Joe Biden confounds critics by ending tough year on a high note
entries.description: Positive news on the economy, legislative agenda and global affairs sets up president for re-election bid

entries.title: Nicaragua cracks down on Catholic Church
entries.description: Daniel Ortega’s regime shows its intent against last bastion of dissent with trial of outspoken bishop of Matagalpa

entries.title: Croatia anticipates economic boost as it prepares to adopt euro
entries.description: Former Yugoslav nation long in pursuit of closer integration with EU switches to single currency on January 1

entries.title: Apple’s business under growing threat from China’s Covid wave
entries.description: Supply chain experts warn outbreak following reversal of zero-Covid curbs creates uncertainty for iPhone maker

entries.title: China estimates 250mn people have caught Covid in 20 days
entries.description: Figures presented at closed-door meeting are in stark contrast to low official case count

entries.title: Hua Hong gives China new hope with old chip technology
entries.description: US restrictions on advanced tech help foundry benefit from Beijing’s shifting view of the semiconductor supply chain
